title: Course Creator with LMS, Video Editing, and AI Experience
job_overview:
???? Job Opportunity: CE Course Creator with LMS, Video Editing, and AI Experience
Are you a creative instructional designer, video content editor, and AI-savvy course builder looking to take part in shaping powerful CE (Continuing Education) classes?

We are seeking an experienced content creator to help develop high-quality CE courses using a modern Learning Management System (LMS). You will be responsible for editing instructional videos, structuring interactive lessons, and utilizing AI tools (especially ChatGPT) to enhance content quality and delivery.

?? Important: You must submit your application as a short video answering the key questions below. Text-only responses will be disregarded.

? Key Responsibilities
Design and structure CE courses on an LMS (e.g., Teachable, LearnWorlds, Kajabi, Moodle, or similar)

Edit video content for clarity, engagement, and flow (adding captions, transitions, music, etc.)

Use AI tools like ChatGPT, Descript, Pictory, Synthesia, or similar for:

Scriptwriting

Lesson plan generation

AI-generated video assistance

Coordinate with subject-matter experts to transform raw ideas into polished educational content

Ensure all course components align with CE accreditation standards and offer learner engagement

???? Must-Have Experience
Proven experience building online courses with LMS platforms

Video editing experience (Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere, CapCut, or AI-powered tools)

Demonstrable use of ChatGPT or similar AI tools for content planning or media creation

Ability to work independently and hit deadlines

Strong visual and instructional design sense

???? How to Apply (VIDEO REQUIRED)
Please record and send a 2–3 minute video answering the following:

What LMS platforms have you used, and what specific course features did you build?

What video editing tools do you use, and what’s one editing trick you always apply to educational content?

How have you used AI or ChatGPT in course or video creation? Be specific.

What’s your approach to structuring a CE course from scratch?

Why are you the perfect fit for this role?

???? Your video is your first test — quality, clarity, and presentation matter. Think of it as your first lesson!
